login.title: Connect with WebAuth
login.body: Scan with WebAuth on your mobile device or click the button below to open on this device.

transact.title: Complete using WebAuth
transact.body: Please open your WebAuth Wallet on "{{channelName}}" to review and approve this transaction.
transact.body_browser: Please complete the transaction using the WebAuth popup window.
transact.label: Sign manually or with another device

error.expired: The request expired, please try again.
error.invalid_response: Invalid response from WebAuth, must contain link_ch, link_key, link_name and cid flags.
error.cancelled: The request was cancelled from WebAuth.
